graph_title: The share of children at the end of lower secondary achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in (i) reading and (ii) mathematics
indicator_name: The share of children at the end of lower secondary achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in (i) reading and (ii) mathematics
national_indicator_description: The indicator is calculated as a percentage of the 14-year-old population and 9th grade pupils
computation_definitions: Secondary school - a type of educational institution implementing basic general education programs with advanced teaching of one or more general, including stream or separate subjects.
computation_calculations: The ratio of 9th grade pupils of the secondary schools to the 14-year-old population.
source_organisation_2: Ministry of Education, Science, Culture and Sport of RA
